lom:description.lom:string: This web-based software teaches the user concepts about science at Santa Barbara. The software contains information on the following topics: - Things For Your Laboratory: Books, Kits, Chemicals, Supplies and Curiosities. - Some Science Experiments you can do. - Some science tips. - A list of Science Websites. - Our Visitors' Feedback. - Our New Book Reviews Pages. - Who or What is Santa Barbara Science? The following are a few topics that are covered in this software: - Make a lumia box. - An easy chemical volcano. - Instructions for making slime. - Some fun sound experiments. - How 'bout some cool Dry Ice experiments? - Easy, Fun and Satisfying Laser Activities. - How to make Simple Animation Devices. - Build a Giant Air Cannon. - Mini Maglite Fun.
